contents.text: Thank you for calling Jobvite, Peninsula’s leading recruiting software for sourcing, hiring, and onboarding top talent.
To speak with our Sales team, press 1.
For product demonstrations and platform walkthroughs, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for a product demo.

navigationGoals: I need to book a quick demo of the Jobvite platform.
Schedule a live demo of the Jobvite platform to evaluate its fit for our veteran hiring initiative
I want to schedule a Jobvite platform walkthrough focusing on API and integrations.
I’d like someone to walk me through a live demo of the hiring platform.
Schedule a detailed walkthrough of Jobvite’s sourcing and onboarding features to evaluate its fit for recruiting research assistants in my physics lab.

contents.text: To discuss pricing, licensing, and subscription plans, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to review pricing and subscription plan options.
Get detailed pricing and subscription options for an annual Jobvite license
I need detailed info on subscription plans, licensing limits, and pricing structure.
I need to know the details of subscription plans and pricing options.
Obtain a clear breakdown of subscription tiers and pricing options to determine funding needs for my student-run physics organization.

contents.text: If you need assistance with your existing Jobvite account, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: I'm facing a technical issue with my existing Jobvite account and need support.
Troubleshoot a login error on my existing Jobvite account
I’m experiencing OAuth integration failures on my Jobvite account and need troubleshooting.
I can’t access my account and need help troubleshooting my login.
Troubleshoot login issues with my existing Jobvite account when attempting to post a lab assistant position.

contents.text: For billing, invoicing, and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I have a question about my Jobvite billing and invoice details.
Resolve a discrepancy on my latest Jobvite invoice
I need to review and understand my latest Jobvite billing invoice and payment terms.
I have questions about my latest invoice and billing charges.
Clarify a recent invoice charge and update the payment method for my student group’s Jobvite subscription.
